 2008-13382008-07-28,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActHazardous Products Act
PrecisORDER AMENDING PART II OF SCHEDULE I TO THE HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS ACT (LIGHTERS) by changing the definition of lighters so that it covers utility lighters, including multi-purpose or barbecue lighters, and not just cigarette lighters.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0230 Publication Date: 2008-08-06
